title: Update preview page with all new components
description:
Add sections to preview.html showcasing all new components:
- ticks-alert (all variants)
- ticks-spinner (all sizes)
- ticks-dialog (with trigger button)
- ticks-empty-state
- ticks-list-item (multiple examples)
- ticks-header
- ticks-code (inline and block)

Also add a Combined Example section showing components working together.
acceptance_criteria: All components visible and functional in preview page
